Class AbstractMergedWindow

java.lang.Object
xyz.xenondevs.invui.window.AbstractWindow
xyz.xenondevs.invui.window.AbstractDoubleWindow
xyz.xenondevs.invui.window.AbstractMergedWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuiParent, Window
public abstract class AbstractMergedWindow extends AbstractDoubleWindow
A Window where top and player Inventory are affected by the same Gui.

      public void handleSlotElementUpdate(Gui child, int slotIndex)
      Description copied from interface: GuiParent
      Called by the child Gui to report an update of a SlotElement.
      Parameters:
      child - The child Gui whose SlotElement has changed
      slotIndex - The slot index of the changed SlotElement in the child Gui
